means: 大街，街道( street的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: Locking up men does nothing more than keep them off the streets.
sentence.Network_cn: 把这些人关起来只是做到了不让他们上街而已。

sentence.Network_en: Word has been spreading fast of the incidents on the streets.
sentence.Network_cn: 有关街头骚乱的消息迅速传播开来。

sentence.Network_en: Reports from the capital, Lome, say troops are stationed on the streets.
sentence.Network_cn: 来自首都洛美的报道称，部队驻扎在大街上。

PerfectNetExp.abs: On the streets of our cities and on the far - flung battlefields ,, 在我们城市的街道上 , 在遥远的战场上,
Ying got his education on the streets of Hong Kong ., 邢李火原是在香港的街头巷尾受的教育.
Every day 4,000 police patrol the streets ., 每天有 4000 警力上街巡逻.
Inside the market covered with strange atmosphere , the streets were mysteriously whisper ., 交易市场里面满布着诡异的气氛 , 满街的人神秘地交头接耳.

首页-MINA Fashion House-- 淘宝网 ... Fresh sweet 清新甜美 Street Style 街头时尚 Party queen 派对皇后.
第五街(fifth street):发给每1个玩家的第五张牌。填(fill):再拿一张牌,凑成一手牌。
...二百五, 源于街机游戏90年代流行的街机游戏,街头霸王,出自于90年代的一个街机游戏叫,街头霸王,street fighter,是一个格斗游戏,当一方以满血打败另一方时,系统会出示一个英文PERFECT,由于系统发音不标准,日.

entry.def: A street is a road in a city, town, or village, usually with houses along it.

example.tran: 他住在宾菲尔德大街 66 号。

example.ex: Boppard is a small, quaint town with narrow streets.
example.tran: 博帕德是一个有着许多深巷窄道、古香古色的小镇。

entry.def: You can use street or streets when talking about activities that happen out of doors in a town rather than inside a building.

example.ex: Changing money on the street is illegal — always use a bank...
example.tran: 在街头兑换货币是违法的——无论何时都应该去银行。

example.ex: Their aim is to raise a million pounds to get the homeless off the streets.
example.tran: 他们的目标是筹集 100 万英镑，使那些无家可归者不再流浪街头。

entry.def: If someone is streets ahead of you, they are much better at something than you are.

example.ex: He was streets ahead of the other contestants.
example.tran: 他比其他参赛选手水平高出一大截。

entry.def: If you talk about the man in the street or the man or woman in the street, you mean ordinary people in general.

example.ex: The average man or woman in the street doesn't know very much about immune disorders.
example.tran: 普通人一般不是很了解何谓免疫机能紊乱。

entry.def: If a job or activity is up your street, it is the kind of job or activity that you are very interested in.

example.ex: She loved it, this was just up her street.
example.tran: 她喜欢这个，这正中她的意。

auth_sentence.content: Erm, tanks on the streets, pitched battles?

Sentence.sentence: They are really pretty little towns with lots of old housesand beautiful tree-lined streets.
And when joggers (慢跑者) jog, they don't run the streets.
